metadata.title: CVE-2014-9669 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple integer overflows in sfnt/ttcmap.c in FreeType before 2.5.4 allowremote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read or memorycorruption) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted cmapSFNT table.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9669` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

freetype2-demos - 2.5.2-1ubuntu2.4
libfreetype6 - 2.5.2-1ubuntu2.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freetype package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.2-1ubuntu2.4').
